title: [Medicine] Fecal Microbiota Transplantation Relieves Gastrointestinal and Autism Symptoms by Improving the Gut Microbiota in an Open-Label Study (Oct 2021, n=40) One Donor. Two routes of administration. 1x/week, 4 weeks. Neither vancomycin nor proton pump inhibitors (PPIs) was given before FMT.
